snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry hopes to explore the possibility of working with Mr. Putin on an array of regional crises, especially the Syrian war.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry meets with Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin in Sochi, Russia, for over four hours on reaching strategy to end Syrian war and solve Ukraine crisis.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry hopes to explore the possibility of working with Mr. Putin on an array of regional crises, especially the Syrian war.

headline.main: Kerry Arrives in Russia for Talks With Vladimir Putin on Cooperation
headline.print_headline: Tone Is More Cordial in New Talks Between Kerry and Russians
